name: msg-api
description: Graphql server for msg client applications

scripts.initialize: npm run db:init && npm run db:seed
scripts.init-db: cd DIR_WHERE_MYSQL_BIN_IS && echo 'DROP DATABASE IF EXISTS api_node_demo; CREATE DATABASE api_node_demo CHARACTER SET utf8 COLLATE utf8_general_ci' | ./mysql -u root && cd -
scripts.reset:db: docker rm -f local-sql && docker run --rm --name=local-sql --env MYSQL_ROOT_PASSWORD=password --detach --publish 3306:3306 mysql:5.7.24
scripts.restart: npm run reset:db && npm run initialize && npm run start

author: Matthew J Hough
